entry.string: The Censor Module is a utility module
entry.translation: Zee Censur Mudoole-a is a uteelity mudoole

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Censoring words and phrases that you do not find appropriate for your website
entry.translation: Censureeng vurds und phreses thet yuoo du nut feend epprupreeete-a fur yuoor vebseete

entry.string: You have the ability to add, delete, modify and view the censor words that you find offensive on your website. In addition, in the modify config portion of your module, you can decide what to replace the words with, and the number of censor items to view at once.
entry.translation: Yuoo hefe-a zee ebeelity tu edd, delete-a, mudeeffy und feeoo zee censur vurds thet yuoo feend ooffffenseefe-a oon yuoor vebseete-a. In eddeeshun, in zee mudeeffy cunffeeg purshun ooff yuoor mudoole-a, yuoo cun deceede-a vhet tu replece-a zee vurds veet, und zee noomber ooff censur items tu feeoo et oonce-a.
Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Transform hook allows you to choose which modules you want to censor and which you do not.
entry.translation: Trunsffurm huuk elloos yuoo tu chuuse-a vheech mudooles yuoo vunt tu censur und vheech yuoo du nut. Um de hur de hur de hur.
